mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${orderPartner} ( receive_time, return_time, pet_name, sex, age, phone, user_name, remark, user_id, partner_id, order_date, order_status, amt, effective, ) VALUES ( #{receiveTime}, #{returnTime}, #{petName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{userName}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{partnerId}, #{orderDate}, #{orderStatus}, #{amt}, '1' )
